content: I haven't stayed in any of these hotels, but based on customers' reviews, pod 51 and row nyc hotel are often recommended as affordable and convenient options in midtown manhattan. both hotels offer clean and comfortable rooms at affordable prices. the pod 51 is known for its minimalist design and its rooftop lounge, while the row nyc hotel has a prime location near times square and offers different types of rooms to fit different needs and budgets. ultimately, the choice will depend on the traveler's preferences and needs.
